content: A female name and palindrome, it is also the name of the first woman according to the Bible.

The name you're referring to is "Eve." In the Bible, Eve is considered the first woman, created by God from one of Adam's ribs in the Book of Genesis. The term "palindrome" refers to a word, phrase, or sequence that reads the same backward as forward. However, "Eve" is indeed a palindrome because it spells the same way backward and forward.
